sense.name: Move outward with volition.
sense.examples: The soldier diffused over the battle field. We diffused throughout the crowd.

sense.name: (Cause to) become widely distributed.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] DIFFUSE NP2[patient] NP1[theme] DIFFUSE
sense.examples: My opponent has diffused false accusations about me. The media diffused a vile rumor. Particles diffused throughout the air.
